content:
I sometimes panic
When it occurs to me,
that the person I love the most in the whole world
is slowly disappearing
and there isnâ€™t much I can do about it
But I also always feel connected to her
when Iâ€™m daydreaming
When Iâ€™m not thinking about anything
And this song was written in one of those moments
when I felt she was so palpable
I was on the train, zoning out
Listening to a guitar riff from Jiajun
Aimlessly trying to write a song with it
The melody emerged
Then came the message
A massege from and to myself
Donâ€™t panic!
Sheâ€™ll find the place
Far and far away
For another day
I like it!
And hopefully you too~

title: A message from and to ourselves

content:
Spotifyâ€‚Apple Musicâ€‚Bandcampâ€‚QQ Musicâ€‚Bilibiliâ€‚ğŸ¦‹
Do you sometimes panic?
Or feel that the person you love the most in the whole world
Seems slowly disappearing?ğŸ¦‹ A message from and to ourselves Sun Oct 15 2023 thoughts song stories songwriting I made a promise
Iâ€™ll never touch the ground
Thought Iâ€™m gonna get there
Way before she does
Sheâ€™s running to the sun
Not stopping anywhere
She thinks that she just
Needs a place
Far and far and far and far and far and far away
For and for and for and for and for another day
Cuz I know her I know myself
Cuz I know her I know myself
I heard the thunder
It came across the stars
I could barely see her
Shining through the crowd
Sheâ€™s running to the sun
Not stopping anywhere
She thinks that she will
Find the place
Far and far and far and far and far and far away
For and for and for and for and for another day
Cuz I know her I know myself
Cuz I know her I know myself

title: Her

content:
Big statement, but it is real!
I love singing since I was little, but song writing is new to me. Ever since I started it, so much has been going on in my mind and in my life, and oddly enough, I spend more time in â€˜silenceâ€™ now â€” silence with music and stuff happening vividly in constancy.
I really enjoyed my current status and I want to keep it up!
So for those who listen to and like my songs at such an early stage, thank you so much for your support! It means a lot to me. And I sincerely hope that youâ€™ve enjoyed your journey in my music!
Cheers!
summary: Big statement, but it is real!
title: Music is everywhere

content:
Bandcampâ€‚SoundCloudâ€‚YouTubeâ€‚Bilibiliâ€‚ğŸ¦
Kindness and indifference
are not easy to distinguishğŸ¦ I know I was once haunted
And then they call me a victim
Like a mark, on my life
I never said I didnâ€™t like it
They never said that they were sorry
To interfere, my future
I see that circle (everywhere)
Itâ€™s a trap (I know)
But Iâ€™m gotta try my best not to return back to that path
I see that circle (everywhere)
I see that circle (everywhere)
Canâ€™t say the scars wonâ€™t fade
But then the pain will blend into
All the coming days (everywhere)
Until I let go, myself
Until I lift up, myself
Until I let go, myself
Until I lift up, myself
Until I let go, myself
Until I lift up, myself
Until I let go, myself
Until I lift up, myself
